SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Network.Server

Class ServerImpl

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Network.Server.ServerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ServerImpl extends Object implements Serializable
ServerImpl class is an implementation of the RemoteController interface. It provides remote control functionality for managing game sessions.
See Also:

      Parameters:
      gameID - The ID of the game.
      colors - The colors of the tiles to place.
      column - The column in which to place the tiles.
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
